Service Details: - Offers a 12-week program set in a safe and supportive environment where young people can learn about and gain valuable life skills in a group environment- Space is limited to 15 young people per Supper Club with four clubs running per year
Eligibility: Participation in an intake and orientation session is required before attending
How to Apply: A referral from a health professional is required to access this service
Meetings: Mon: 4:30pm - 7:30pm @ Wellness Development Centre, CMHA Kelowna @ 504 Sutherland Ave, Kelowna
